title: Group Therapy: Are his kind gestures too much?
description: Lily has been dating a guy for 2 months and he does tons of nice things for her but now she's starting to feel like it's becoming too much.  He'll come over uninvited with dinner and he even went to her house before she left for work at 6am last week to wipe the snow off her car.  Should she run or is she over-thinking it and he's just a really good person?
